Blackfang pressed the yes key. He wanted to know more about this guy. 
But he realized that the damages went beyond his technical knowledge.

Blackfang: Kenzo, we have to repair the protoform's id and language 
circuitries. It seems stabilized for now. Think you can do it?

In the mean time, he redirected the energy flow from the cable to the 
protoform.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> ???::
> 
> The follow info was displayed in pod's control pad.
> 
> Report: Identity circuits, damaged; Language circuits, damaged; 
> Learing circuits, undamaged; energy, medium.
> 
> the pod is unable to reparation of Identity's circuits, external 
> reparation is advisable. 
> 
> Protophorm's status: stable and semi-unconceous.
> 
> Do you whant to know protophorm's characteristics? 
> 
>            yes                                     no
